005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark;
007
008import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.Formatter;
009import com.vladsch.flexmark.html.HtmlRenderer;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.FlexmarkHtmlConverter;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.ListOptions;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.data.DataHolder;
014
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.impl.FixedEmphasisDelimiterProcessor;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.impl.FlexmarkConfiguration;
017
018import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
019
020/**
021 * Provides factory methods for Flexmark processing to support HTML-to-markdown
022 * and markdown-to-HTML conversion.
023 */
024@SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
025public final class FlexmarkFactory {
026  @NonNull
027  private static final FlexmarkFactory SINGLETON = new FlexmarkFactory();
028  @NonNull
029  private final Parser markdownParser;
030  @NonNull
031  private final HtmlRenderer htmlRenderer;
032  @NonNull
033  private final Formatter formatter;
034  @NonNull
035  private final FlexmarkHtmlConverter htmlConverter;
036  @NonNull
037  final ListOptions listOptions;
038
039  /**
040   * Get the static Flexmark factory instance.
041   *
042   * @return the instance
043   */
044  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidSynchronizedAtMethodLevel")
045  @NonNull
046  public static synchronized FlexmarkFactory instance() {
047    return SINGLETON;
048  }
049
050  /**
051   * Get a Flexmark factory instance that uses the provided Flexmark
052   * configuration.
053   *
054   * @param config
055   *          the Flexmark configuration
056   * @return the instance
057   */
058  @NonNull
059  public static FlexmarkFactory newInstance(@NonNull DataHolder config) {
060    return new FlexmarkFactory(config);
061  }
062
063  private FlexmarkFactory() {
064    this(FlexmarkConfiguration.instance());
065  }
066
067  @SuppressWarnings("null")
068  private FlexmarkFactory(@NonNull DataHolder config) {
069    this.markdownParser = Parser.builder(config)
070        .customDelimiterProcessor(new FixedEmphasisDelimiterProcessor(Parser.STRONG_WRAPS_EMPHASIS.get(config)))
071        .build();
072    this.htmlRenderer = HtmlRenderer.builder(config).build();
073    this.formatter = Formatter.builder(config).build();
074    this.htmlConverter = FlexmarkHtmlConverter.builder(config).build();
075    this.listOptions = ListOptions.get(config);
076  }
077
078  /**
079   * Get configured options for processing HTML and markdown lists.
080   *
081   * @return the options
082   */
083  @NonNull
084  public ListOptions getListOptions() {
085    return listOptions;
086  }
087
088  /**
089   * Get the Flexmark markdown parser, which can produce a markdown syntax tree.
090   *
091   * @return the parser
092   */
093  @NonNull
094  public Parser getMarkdownParser() {
095    return markdownParser;
096  }
097
098  /**
099   * Get the Flexmark HTML renderer, which can produce HTML from a markdown syntax
100   * tree.
101   *
102   * @return the parser
103   */
104  @NonNull
105  public HtmlRenderer getHtmlRenderer() {
106    return htmlRenderer;
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Get the Flexmark formatter, which can produce markdown from a markdown syntax
111   * tree.
112   *
113   * @return the parser
114   */
115  @NonNull
116  public Formatter getFormatter() {
117    return formatter;
118  }
119
120  /**
121   * Get the Flexmark HTML converter, which can produce markdown from HTML
122   * content.
123   *
124   * @return the parser
125   */
126  @NonNull
127  public FlexmarkHtmlConverter getFlexmarkHtmlConverter() {
128    return htmlConverter;
129  }
130}
